Levio.Name: Levio
Levio.Title: Full stack developer
Levio.Description: Fullstack developer at Levio, working on diverse client projects, each with unique technologies, applications, and business logic. Adapted to various environments to deliver tailored solutions, ensuring alignment with each client’s specific needs.

Nerium.Name: Nerium software
Nerium.Title: Full stack developer
Nerium.Description: Worked on a team migrating the ERP software “Flowone/Vinistoria” from Delphi to a modern SaaS web ERP with microservices. Focused on frontend with Angular and DevExtreme, and backend using .NET Core 3.1, NHibernate, and SQL Server. Also contributed to the IdCloudPlatform project, using .NET 5, Entity Framework Core, and PostgreSQL, following Agile and Scrum methodologies.

Bitbase.Name: Bitbase
Bitbase.Title: Full stack developer
Bitbase.Description: Worked on KAMEON 3, migrating from ASP.NET Web Forms to modern technologies using ASP.NET Core 2.2 and Angular 7. Developed an ERP with a custom UI library in Angular Material and a backend with SQL Server, utilizing a custom ORM and the CQS design pattern. Project management followed Agile and Scrum with Jira.

TSI.Name: TSI
TSI.Title: Analyst Developer
TSI.Description: Contributed to TSI's ERP project, tailored for Tunisian businesses, focusing on management, accounting, payroll, and more. Developed new features, improved quality, and fixed bugs using .NET 4.5 and C#. Also worked onsite with FARMASI, TSI's largest client, to develop a custom commercial management software. Both projects followed Agile and Scrum methodologies, managed with PROJEQTOR.

AACMI.Name: AACMI
AACMI.Title: Analyst Developer
AACMI.Description: Developed a custom mini ERP for the Ministry of Interior's agents and executives, including HR, accounting, events, and membership modules. Handled analysis, design, and development using WinForms on .NET Framework 4.5. Also created and maintained a WordPress CMS blog for AACMI news.
